name: The Corners
description:
Explore the corners of the universe, where no man was meant to.
____________________________
The Corners adds interesting and unique dimensions based off of Liminal Space's! Explore wonderous lands all by lighting your way through paintings taking you to unique and fascinating places!
____________________________
Credits:
Shai, for helping with the designs of each dimension, and supplying us with beautiful textures!
KraCactus, for helping with the designs of each dimensions.
LudoCrypt, me, for developing the whole thing, and most of the OST!
Racoon Syndrome, too, for helping with the amazingly chilling OST!
(It's a joint soundtrack)
Big thank you to Basement Spider for helping with the Radio textures!
Huge thank you to ImXR24 for the Gaia woodset textures!
